edu.illinois.mitra.starl.interfaces

Interface MessageListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarrierSynchronizer, BullyLeaderElection, DSMMultipleAttr, Geocaster, GroupSetMutex, LogicThread, PickedLeaderElection, RandomLeaderElection, RobotsActivity, SingleHopMutualExclusion

    public interface MessageListener
    Objects implementing MessageListener may register themselves with the main GVH.comms object to be notified of received messages
    See Also:
